svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Number of terrorism fatalities by region
Total number of fatalities from terrorism-related attacks by region. This represents the number of total confirmed
fatalities, and includes all victims and attackers who died as a direct result of the incident.
